reviews.review: fun ig
me divierte mucho,me gusta mas que el porno

Game devs ruined this game, patch after patch. 
New killers over tuned for new players. 
Survivors now have perks that make playing killer a very aggravating experience. 

New maps are designed to be super boring for one side or the other.

The main strategy for winning a match as survivor has changed to playing super passively, stealthy, and spread out. Which is a very boring experience for the killer side. 

The main strategy for winning a match as killer has changed to being extremely campy, or hitting and running, with next to no tracking involved anymore. Killers are often picked not by their skill cap, but how easy they are to play. 

Everyone plays just to meta game, and not to have fun.

The community is awful, in every way imaginable . I don't recommend this game to anyone.

For those who do play and have thousands of hours, its only being played as a means to hangout with friends when there is nothing better to play. Or they stream it as their job.

veldig bra

This game is very problematic. While the devs provide constant support for the game with updates and hotfixes, they never work to solve the core issues of this game, which include but r not limited to, this game being complete garbage. Without referencing specific strategy or perks or items or killer abilities, the general feeling you get when you play this game as a survivor is "wow what can i really do against this killer?". The killers are too strong against the survivors. After pure luck, there is nothing you can do to beat a good killer. And, even if you are a low rank, the matchmaking often times matches you against high rank killers anyways. The game doesnt cater to new or low rank survivors. Simply put, it is too hard to play as a survivor and too easy as a killer. It is definitely an "asymmetrical horror game" in that regard. I would not recommend this game to any new players, and i would also caution current players from continuing to waste their time on it. The player base is dwindling because the devs consistently ignore these foundational problems (but what do you really expect coming from a canadian company). And as a result, the small player base that remains has become extremely toxic. I am constantly being told to hang myself after game. My sincerest hope for the future is that trump gets re elected so he can ban canadian based video games.

Um ótimo jogo para rever seus assassinos mais fodas do cinema e ter muita diversão com seus amigos, o jogo tem um conceito legal, mas eu acho que o jogo necessita de mais atualizações de gameplay, já que o jogo não recebe tantas mecânicas novas além de novos assassinos e sobreviventes, recentemente ''os arquivos'' foi uma ótima atualização já que particularmente gosto de ver a história do jogo e fazer missões
Эта игра не сбалансированна для рандомов, имеет кучу ошибок, разрабам на всёх плевать вечный кемпинг, тунелинг.

Игра супер классная.Но есть одно "но" разработчики работают не в ту сторону.Они не фиксят огромное кол-во багов,но зато у нас постоянно выходят новые скинчики на разных персов.Выглядит это так будто:
-Ну чё может баги пофиксим?
-Да не зачем,щас скинов нарисуем и нормально будет.
-ААА,ну ладно и так схавают.
За последние месяцы,ситуация немного изменилась,разрабы начали пытаться что то предпринимать)

Yes I would highly recommend this game. 
When u ignore the fact ,that it takes terribly long to queue as killer and that some people disconnect  in matches, it really is a great game. 
Especially the Rift is very interesting, because you can sort of see how the killers became killers and find out some lore.
I would give it a 8.5/10 because there are almost no other games like this.

Daha yeni indirimlerde aldım.10dk oyun bulmasını bekliyorsun.Buluyor herkes 50 level karakter,bütün perkler açık,dodge,taktik her bir yarrağımı biliyor.Sen beni siken yok mu diye ölümünü bekliyorsun.Ölmekten oyunu öğrenemiyorsun.Bu kadar aptal bir mm sistemi hiç bir oyunda görmedim.Varsa senle beraber dört(4) arkadaşın aldır,oyna,eğlen onun dışında leş bir oyun.

A lot of chronic issues the devs don't address. Overall unfun.
